• Comhchoistí Oibreachais roimh 7 Iúil 2011
Joint Labour Committees regulate conditions of employment and set minimum rates of pay for employees in certain sectors, by means of Employment Regulation Orders (EROs)
Rialaíonn na Comhchoistí Oibreachais ná coinníollacha oibre agus íosrátaí pá d' fhostaithe in earnálacha áirithe trí Orduithe Rialaithe Fostaíochta
A Joint Labour Committee (JLC) is established by a statutory order of the Labour Court under the Industrial Relations Act 1946
Bunaítear Comhchoiste Oibreachais trí ordú reachtúil ón gCúirt Oibreachais faoin Acht Caidrimh Thionscail 1946
It is an independent body made up of equal numbers of employer and worker representatives appointed by the Labour Court, with a chair appointed by the Minister for Jobs, Enterprise and Innovation

Is comhlachas neamhspleách é ina bhfuil an méid céanna fostóirí agus ionadaithe na n-oibrithe atá ceaptha ag an gCúirt Oibreachais, agus ceapann An tAire Post, Fiontar agus Nuálaíochta an Cathaoirleach
Any of the following can apply to the Labour Court to set up a JLC:
Baineann seo leanas leis an gCúirt Oibreachais chun Comhchoiste Oibreachais a bhunú:
• The Minister for Jobs, Enterprise and Innovation
• An tAire Post, Fiontar agus Nuálaíochta
• An organisation claiming to represent the workers or employers involved
• Eagraíocht a dhéanann ionadaíocht ar son oibrithe agus fostóirí atá bainteach leis an gcás
The Industrial Relations (Amendment) Act 2012, which reformed reforming the Joint Labour Committees’ wage-setting mechanisms, came into force on 1 August 2012
An 1 Lúnasa 2012 tháinig an tAcht Caidrimh Thionscail (Leasú) 2012 (pdf) a d'athchóirigh na meicníochtaí cinneadh pá na Comhchoistí Oibreachais i bhfeidhm
The Act provides for the Labour Court to adopt an Employment Regulation Order drawn up by a JLC
Faoin Acht, uchtaíonn an Chúirt Oibreachais Ordú Rialaithe Fostaíochta (ORF) dréachtaithe ag Comhchoiste Oibreachais
The ERO is then given statutory effect by the Minister for Jobs, Enterprise and Innovation
Tugann an tAire Post, Fiontar agus Nuálaíochta éifeacht reachtúil don ORF
The Act's provisions include:
Cuimsíonn forálacha na reachtaíochta:
• JLCs have the power to set a basic adult wage rate and 2 additional higher rates
• Tá cumhacht ag na CCO leag síos bunráta do dhuine fásta agus 2 ráta fhorlíontach níos airde
• Companies may seek exemption from paying ERO rates due to financial difficulty
• Tá cead ag cuideachtaí díolúine a chuardaigh ón ghá rátaí ORF agus CFC a íoc de bharr deacracht airgeadais
• JLCs no longer set Sunday premium rates
• Ní leagann CCO síos rátaí préimh Domhnach níos mó
A new statutory Code of Practice on Sunday working is to be prepared by the Workplace Relations Commission
Beidh an Coimisiún um Chaidreamh Oibreachais ag ullmhú Cód Cleachtais nua maidir le hobair Domhnachomh
• When setting wage rates JLCs will have to take into account factors such as competitiveness and rates of employment and unemployment
• Nuair leagann CCO rátaí síos, caithfidh siad go gcuirtear critéir nua san áireamh ar nós tosca iomaíochais agus rátaí fostaíochta agus dífhostaíochta
There are new EROs for the contract cleaning and security industries – see below
Tá ORF nua le haghaidh tionscail glanadh ar chonradh agus slándála i bhfeidhm – féach thíos

Joint Labour Committees before July 2011
Comhchoistí Oibreachais roimh 7 Iúil 2011
Previously some employments were covered by agreements made by Joint Labour Committees
Roimhe sin bhí roinnt fostaíochtaí clúdaithe i gcomhaontuithe a raibh déanta ag Comhchoistí Oibreachais
Following a High Court decision Employment Regulation Orders ceased to have statutory effect from 7 July 2011
Ag leanúint ó chinneadh na hArd-Chúirte, stad Orduithe Rialaithe Fostaíochta d’aon tionchar reachtúla ón 7 Iúil 2011
Employees who were covered by an ERO have existing contracts of employment which govern their pay and conditions of work
Tá conarthaí fostaíochta reatha ag fostaithe a bhí clúdaithe ag ORF a rialaíonn a bpá agus a gcoinníollacha oibre
If an employer reduces an employee’s rate of pay this would be a change in their contract of employment and normally such changes require the employee’s consent
Má laghdaíonn fostóir ráta pá an fhostaí is athrú ar a gconradh fostaíochta a bheadh anseo agus de ghnáth teastaíonn cead an fhostaí chun é seo a dhéanamh
